meanings.sent1: I love taking care of my houseplants by watering them regularly.

meanings.definition: Plants that are suitable for growing indoors.
meanings.sent1: Houseplants are great for adding a touch of nature to any room.
meanings.sent2: Choosing the right houseplants can make a big difference in indoor air quality.
meanings.sent3: My houseplants always seem to be gossiping about the outdoor plants they see through the window.
